[999.999 Money]
D3000000 08000000
005209E0 000F423F
D2000000 00000000

[Ch.1 Inf. Energy]
D3000000 09000000
20221ED4 00000003
D2000000 00000000

[Ch.2 Inf. Energy]
D3000000 09000000
2026EEE4 00000003
D2000000 00000000

[Ch.3 Inf. Energy]
D3000000 09000000
002BBEF4 00000003
D2000000 00000000

[Car Inf. Energy / Nitro]
D3000000 08000000
008A4358 00000003
D2000000 00000000
{As soon as you'r done with the Car Salesman challenge turn it off. Don't go to other areas with this code on}

[Time - 5:00 am]

0013D50C 40A130B6
D2000000 00000000

[Game Speed x0.10]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA4C 3D800000
D2000000 00000000

[Game Speed x0.25]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA4C 3E800000
D2000000 00000000

[Game Speed x0.50]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA4C 3F000000
D2000000 00000000

[Game Speed x1]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA4C 3F800000
D2000000 00000000

[Game Speed x 2]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA4C 40000000
D2000000 00000000

[Slow Time]
D3000000 00000000
00288110 40F00000
0028811C 41400000
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 08000000
0013DA4C 3E800000
D2000000 00000000
{This will let you move really fast while the enemies will be on slowmotion. Useful to avoid enemies when you want to explore new areas}

[Game Speed x 1 - Press L & R]
DD000000 00000300
D3000000 08000000
0013DA4C 44FFFFFF
D2000000 00000000
{Use this in combination with the code above. A side effect of the Slow Time code is that battles will also play on slowmotion. Press L& R buttons while battling to mitigate this issue.}

[Game Speed x 2 - B]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA4C 3F800000
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000002
D3000000 08000000
0013DA4C 40000000
D2000000 00000000

[Ch. Speed x1]
D3000000 00000000
00288110 3F800000
D2000000 00000000

[Ch. Speed x2]
D3000000 00000000
00288110 40000000
D2000000 00000000

[Ch. Running Speed x1]
D3000000 00000000
0028811C 3FB00000
D2000000 00000000

[Ch. Running Speed x2]
D3000000 00000000
0028811C 40000000
D2000000 00000000

[Zoom: + 1]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA2C 3FA00000
D2000000 00000000

[Zoom: Normal]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA2C 3F800000
D2000000 00000000

[Zoom: - 0.5]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA2C 3F400000
D2000000 00000000

[Zoom: - 1]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA2C 3F000000
D2000000 00000000

[Zoom: - 2]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA2C 3EF00000
D2000000 00000000

[Zoom: - 3]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA2C 3EA00000
D2000000 00000000

[Zoom: - 4]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA2C 3E500000
D2000000 00000000

[Zoom: - 5 (Big area)]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA2C 3E200000
D2000000 00000000
{Be careful with it. I wouldn't recomend to use any zoom code past -4. The fps drop is brutal and it can freeze your game}

[Zoom: - 6 (Almost full area)]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA2C 3E100000
D2000000 00000000
{Same as above}

[Wild West mini game points]
D3000000 08000000
0027E7D4 00004E20
D2000000 00000000

[Weather: Rain]
D3000000 08000000
0013DA84 00000001
D2000000 00000000
{Move to a new area to see the effect}
